data.inputParameter: [{"fieldType":"string","fieldChineseName":"股票代码","isNeed":"1","describe":"输入不超过300只股票代码，用逗号分隔；如： 000001,600000","fieldName":"scode","defaultValue":"","checkRule":"(\\d{6},){0,299}\\d{6}"},{"fieldType":"string","fieldChineseName":"报告期","isNeed":"0","describe":"报告期  可为空，为空取所有报告期 ","fieldName":"rdate","defaultValue":"","checkRule":"[0-9]{8}|[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}|[0-9]{4}/[0-9]{2}/[0-9]{2}"},{"fieldType":"string","fieldChineseName":"合并类型","isNeed":"0","describe":"通过p_public0006可获取，对应的总类编码为‘071’","fieldName":"type","defaultValue":"","checkRule":"[0-9]{6}"},{"fieldType":"string","fieldChineseName":"数据来源","isNeed":"0","describe":"通过p_public0006可获取，对应的总类编码为‘033’","fieldName":"source","defaultValue":"","checkRule":"[0-9]{6}"},{"fieldType":"string","fieldChineseName":"结果集格式","isNeed":"0","describe":"设置结果返回的格式，可选的有xml、json、csv、dbf","fieldName":"format","defaultValue":"","checkRule":""},{"fieldType":"string","fieldChineseName":"结果列选择","isNeed":"0","describe":"选择结果集中所需要的字段，多列用逗号分隔，如@column=a,b","fieldName":"@column","defaultValue":"","checkRule":""},{"fieldType":"int","fieldChineseName":"结果条数限制","isNeed":"0","describe":"设置结果返回的条数","fieldName":"@limit","defaultValue":"","checkRule":""},{"fieldType":"string","fieldChineseName":"结果集排序","isNeed":"0","describe":"设置结果集的格式，如 @orderby=id:desc  @orderby=id:asc","fieldName":"@orderby","defaultValue":"","checkRule":""}]
data.name: p_stock2303
data.outputDescribes:
个股报告期指标表
请求方式：GET 和 POST
data.outputParameter: [{"fieldName":"ORGNAME","fieldChineseName":"机构名称","fieldType":"VARCHAR","describe":""},{"fieldName":"SECCODE","fieldChineseName":"证券代码","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":""},{"fieldName":"SECNAME","fieldChineseName":"证券简称","fieldType":"VARCHAR","describe":""},{"fieldName":"STARTDATE","fieldChineseName":"开始日期","fieldType":"DATE","describe":""},{"fieldName":"ENDDATE","fieldChineseName":"截止日期","fieldType":"DATE","describe":""},{"fieldName":"F001V","fieldChineseName":"数据来源编码","fieldType":"VARCHAR","describe":""},{"fieldName":"F002V","fieldChineseName":"数据来源","fieldType":"VARCHAR","describe":""},{"fieldName":"F003N","fieldChineseName":"每股收益","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：元"},{"fieldName":"F004N","fieldChineseName":"基本每股收益","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：元"},{"fieldName":"F005N","fieldChineseName":"稀释每股收益","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：元"},{"fieldName":"F006N","fieldChineseName":"扣除非经常性损益每股收益","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：元"},{"fieldName":"F007N","fieldChineseName":"每股未分配利润","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：元"},{"fieldName":"F008N","fieldChineseName":"每股净资产","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"净资产/股本"},{"fieldName":"F009N","fieldChineseName":"调整后每股净资产","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":""},{"fieldName":"F010N","fieldChineseName":"每股资本公积金","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"资本公积/股本"},{"fieldName":"F011N","fieldChineseName":"营业利润率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业利润/营业收入*100"},{"fieldName":"F012N","fieldChineseName":"营业税金率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业税金/营业收入*100"},{"fieldName":"F013N","fieldChineseName":"营业成本率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业成本/营业收入*100"},{"fieldName":"F014N","fieldChineseName":"净资产收益率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"净利润/股东权益*100"},{"fieldName":"F015N","fieldChineseName":"投资收益率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"投资收益/(交易性金融资产+可供出售金融资产+持有至到期投资+长期股权投资)*100"},{"fieldName":"F016N","fieldChineseName":"总资产报酬率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"净利润/(期末资产总额+期初资产总额)/2*100"},{"fieldName":"F017N","fieldChineseName":"净利润率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"净利润/营业收入*100"},{"fieldName":"F018N","fieldChineseName":"管理费用率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"管理费用/营业收入*100"},{"fieldName":"F019N","fieldChineseName":"财务费用率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"财务费用/营业收入*100"},{"fieldName":"F020N","fieldChineseName":"成本费用利润率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"利润总额/成本费用总额×100"},{"fieldName":"F021N","fieldChineseName":"三费比重","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"（财务费用+管理费用+营业费用）/营业收入*100"},{"fieldName":"F022N","fieldChineseName":"应收账款周转率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业收入/(期初应收帐款+期末应收帐款)/2"},{"fieldName":"F023N","fieldChineseName":"存货周转率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业成本/(期初存货+期末存货)/2"},{"fieldName":"F024N","fieldChineseName":"运营资金周转率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业收入/(期初流动资产-期初流动负债)+(期末流动资产+期末流动负债)/2"},{"fieldName":"F025N","fieldChineseName":"总资产周转率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业收入/((期初资产总计+期末资产总计)/2)"},{"fieldName":"F026N","fieldChineseName":"固定资产周转率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业收入/((期初固定资产+期末固定资产)/2)"},{"fieldName":"F027N","fieldChineseName":"应收账款周转天数","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"360/应收账款周转率 或（期初应收账款+期末应收账款）/2] / 营业收入"},{"fieldName":"F028N","fieldChineseName":"存货周转天数","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"360/存货周转率；存货周转率=[360*（期初存货+期末存货）/2]/ 营业成本"},{"fieldName":"F029N","fieldChineseName":"流动资产周转率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业收入/[（期初流动资产+期末流动资产）/2]"},{"fieldName":"F030N","fieldChineseName":"流动资产周转天数","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"360/流动资产周转率"},{"fieldName":"F031N","fieldChineseName":"总资产周转天数","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"360/总资产周转率"},{"fieldName":"F032N","fieldChineseName":"股东权益周转率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"营业收入*2/(期初股东权益+期末股东权益)"},{"fieldName":"F033N","fieldChineseName":"流动资产比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"流动资产/总资产*100"},{"fieldName":"F034N","fieldChineseName":"货币资金比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"货币资金/流动资产*100"},{"fieldName":"F035N","fieldChineseName":"交易性金融资产比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"短期投资/流动资产*100"},{"fieldName":"F036N","fieldChineseName":"存货比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"存货/流动资产*100"},{"fieldName":"F037N","fieldChineseName":"固定资产比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"固定资产/总资产*100"},{"fieldName":"F038N","fieldChineseName":"负债结构比","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"流动负债/非流动负债*100"},{"fieldName":"F039N","fieldChineseName":"产权比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"负债总额/股东权益*100"},{"fieldName":"F040N","fieldChineseName":"净资产比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"100-资产负债率；净资产/总资产*100"},{"fieldName":"F041N","fieldChineseName":"资产负债比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"负债总额/资产总额*100"},{"fieldName":"F042N","fieldChineseName":"流动比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"流动资产/流动负债"},{"fieldName":"F043N","fieldChineseName":"速动比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(流动资产-存货)/流动负债"},{"fieldName":"F044N","fieldChineseName":"现金比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"货币资金/流动负债*100"},{"fieldName":"F045N","fieldChineseName":"利息保障倍数","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"息税前利润/利息费用=(利润总额+财务费用)/财务费用"},{"fieldName":"F046N","fieldChineseName":"营运资金","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"流动资产-流动负债"},{"fieldName":"F047N","fieldChineseName":"非流动负债比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"（非流动负债/负债合计）*100"},{"fieldName":"F048N","fieldChineseName":"流动负债比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"流动负债/总负债*100"},{"fieldName":"F049N","fieldChineseName":"保守速动比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"货币资金+交易性金融资产+应收票据+应收帐款+其他应收款)/流动负债，酸性比率"},{"fieldName":"F050N","fieldChineseName":"现金到期债务比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"经营活动现金净流量*100/本期到期的债务=经营活动现金净流量*100/（一年内到期的非流动负债＋应付票据）"},{"fieldName":"F051N","fieldChineseName":"有形资产净值债务率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"流动负债/(股东权益-无形资产)"},{"fieldName":"F052N","fieldChineseName":"营业收入增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(本期营业收入/上期营业收入-1)*100"},{"fieldName":"F053N","fieldChineseName":"净利润增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(本期净利润/上期净利润-1)*100"},{"fieldName":"F054N","fieldChineseName":"净资产增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(期末股东权益/期初股东权益-1)*100"},{"fieldName":"F055N","fieldChineseName":"固定资产增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(期末固定资产/期初固定资产-1)*100"},{"fieldName":"F056N","fieldChineseName":"总资产增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(期末资产总额/期初资产总额-1)*100"},{"fieldName":"F057N","fieldChineseName":"投资收益增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(本期投资收益/上期投资收益-1)*100"},{"fieldName":"F058N","fieldChineseName":"营业利润增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"(本期营业利润/上年同期营业利润-1)*100"},{"fieldName":"F059N","fieldChineseName":"每股现金流量","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"现金流量净额/股本"},{"fieldName":"F060N","fieldChineseName":"每股经营现金流量","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"经营现金净流量/股本"},{"fieldName":"F061N","fieldChineseName":"经营净现金比率（短期债务）","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"经营现金净流量*100/流动负债"},{"fieldName":"F062N","fieldChineseName":"经营净现金比率（全部债务）","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"经营现金净流量*100/负债总额"},{"fieldName":"F063N","fieldChineseName":"经营活动现金净流量与净利润比率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"经营活动现金净流量*100/净利润"},{"fieldName":"F064N","fieldChineseName":"营业收入现金含量","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"经营活动现金流入量*100/营业收入"},{"fieldName":"F065N","fieldChineseName":"全部资产现金回收率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"经营活动现金流量净额*100 /资产总额"},{"fieldName":"F066N","fieldChineseName":"净资产收益率(扣除非经常性损益)","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：%"},{"fieldName":"F067N","fieldChineseName":"净资产收益率-加权","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：%"},{"fieldName":"F068N","fieldChineseName":"净资产收益率-加权(扣除非经常性损益)","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：%"},{"fieldName":"F069D","fieldChineseName":"报告年度","fieldType":"DATE","describe":""},{"fieldName":"F070V","fieldChineseName":"合并类型编码","fieldType":"VARCHAR","describe":""},{"fieldName":"F071V","fieldChineseName":"合并类型","fieldType":"VARCHAR","describe":""},{"fieldName":"F076N","fieldChineseName":"扣除非经常性损益后的净利润","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：元"},{"fieldName":"F077N","fieldChineseName":"非经常性损益合计","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"单位：元"},{"fieldName":"F078N","fieldChineseName":"毛利率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"毛利率=(年末总营业务收入-年末总营业务成本)/年末总营业务收入*100%"},{"fieldName":"F079N","fieldChineseName":"期间费用率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"期间费用率=(年末期间费用/年末营业收入)*100%"},{"fieldName":"F080N","fieldChineseName":"现金转换周期","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"现金转换周期=存货转换期间+应收账款转换期间"},{"fieldName":"F081N","fieldChineseName":"净资产收益率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"净资产收益率=年末净利润/年平均净资产"},{"fieldName":"F082N","fieldChineseName":"净利含金量","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"净利含金量=经营现金净流量/净利润"},{"fieldName":"F083N","fieldChineseName":"非经常性损益占比","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"非经常性损益占比 =非经常性损益/净利润=(资产减值损失+公允价值变动净收益+投资收益+汇兑收益+补贴收入+营业外收入+营业外支出)/净收益"},{"fieldName":"F084N","fieldChineseName":"期间费用增长率","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"期间费用增长率=((年末期间费用-上年末期间费用)/上年末期间费用)*100%"},{"fieldName":"F085N","fieldChineseName":"基本获利能力","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"基本获利能力=年化总资产息税前经常性收益率(EBIT) EBIT=净利润+所得税+利息"},{"fieldName":"F086N","fieldChineseName":"应收账款占比","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"应收账款占比=应收账款/总资产"},{"fieldName":"F087N","fieldChineseName":"存货占比","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"存货占比=存货/总资产"},{"fieldName":"F088N","fieldChineseName":"年化期间费用毛利比","fieldType":"DECIMAL","describe":"年化期间费用毛利比=期间费用/毛利"}]
